text:
@NadineDorries Anyone defending this claptrap  ask yourself this- 

If you broke your leg would you be happier not being treated by Fracture Nurse (A) that tested positive with Covid-19 & couldn't do their shift as self isolating & potentially saving many people's lives including yours!
